cards.title: Torrent
powers: Destroy up to 3 targets with 1 HP. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now.
The next time a target is destroyed, 1 hero target regains 3 HP.

cards.title: Automated Production
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 3 Clusters are revealed. Put the revealed Clusters into your hand and shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.
{TorrentCharacter} may deal herself 2 energy damage. If she takes damage this way, you may play a Cluster.

cards.title: Burst Node
body: When this card enters play, you may draw a card or play a card.
When this card is destroyed, {TorrentCharacter} deals up to X targets 2 projectile damage each, where X = the number of targets destroyed this turn.

cards.title: Collective Salvo
powers: {TorrentCharacter} deals 1 target X projectile damage, where X = the number of Clusters in play. Destroy a target with 1 HP.

cards.title: Divert Attention
body: Each player may put a card other than Divert Attention from their trash on top of their deck.
Destroy 2 targets with 1 HP.

cards.title: Early Warning System
body: Whenever a Cluster would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to {TorrentCharacter}.

cards.title: Ephemeral Deployment
body: The first time a Cluster enters play each turn, you may draw a card or play a card.
powers: Destroy up to 3 targets with 1 HP. Return a random Cluster from your trash to your hand.

cards.title: Focusing Node
body: When this card enters play, you may draw a card or play a card.
When this card is destroyed, {TorrentCharacter} deals 1 target X energy damage, where X = the number of targets destroyed this turn.

cards.title: Generator Node
body: When this card enters play, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Cluster, play it. Otherwise, discard it.
When this card is destroyed, reveal the top X cards of a deck, where X = the number of targets destroyed this turn. Play 1 revealed card and discard the rest.

cards.title: Proximity Node
body: When this card enters play, you may play a card.
When this card is destroyed, you may destroy a target with X*2 or fewer HP, where X = the number of targets destroyed this turn.

cards.title: Recon Node
body: When this card enters play, you may play a card.
When this card is destroyed, X players may each draw a card, where X = the number of targets destroyed this turn.

cards.title: Recovery Node
body: When this card enters play, you may draw a card or play a card.
When this card is destroyed, 1 target regains X HP, where X = the number of targets destroyed this turn.

cards.title: Redundancy Node
body: When this card enters play, you may draw a card and you may play a card.
When this card is destroyed, you may destroy a target with 2 or fewer HP.

cards.title: Repurposed Hardware
body: X on this card = the number of Clusters in your trash.
{TorrentCharacter} deals 1 target X lightning damage. If a Cluster was destroyed this turn, {TorrentCharacter} may deal 1 target X energy damage.
You may shuffle your trash into your deck.

cards.title: Software Update
body: Search your deck or trash for an Ongoing card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
You may destroy a target with 1 HP. If you do, you may play a card or destroy an Ongoing card.

cards.title: Surge Protection
body: Reduce damage dealt to Clusters by 1.
powers: Return all Clusters from your trash to your hand. Destroy this card.

promoCards.title: Torrent
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
Until the start of your next turn, this card counts as a target with 1 HP that is indestructible and immune to damage.

openingLines.default: All right, team! Let's move fast and break things!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Reality needs a hard reboot. Got it.
